hurdle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a problem or difficulty that you must deal with before you can achieve something
hurdle.translation[0].definitions[0].not: overcome/clear/get over etc a hurdle (=deal successfully with a problem)
hurdle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Finding enough money for the project was the first hurdle.
hurdle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: one of a series of small fences that a person or horse has to jump over during a race
hurdle.translation[0].definitions[1].not: clear a hurdle (=successfully jump over a hurdle)
hurdle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to jump over something while you are running
hurdle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He hurdled the fence and ran off down the street.
